verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:28
verses.text: But let a man examine himself, and so let him eat of that bread, and drink of that cup.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:29
verses.text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily, eateth and drinketh damnation to himself, not discerning the Lord’s body.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:30
verses.text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you, and many sleep.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:31
verses.text: For if we would judge ourselves, we should not be judged.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:32
verses.text: But when we are judged, we are chastened of the Lord, that we should not be condemned with the world.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:33
verses.text: Wherefore, my brethren, when ye come together to eat, tarry one for another.
